title: Senator Talha calls on KP Governor, discusses Senate elections, regional issues
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP):Newly elected Senator and former Federal Minister Talha Mehmood called on Governor Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Faisal Karim Kundi at the Governor’s House in Islamabad on Friday.
The meeting was also attended by Vice Chairman of the Talha Mehmood Foundation and Pakistan’s Ambassador-at-Large Mustafa Bin Talha, along with Pakistan Peoples Party Khyber Pakhtunkhwa’s Deputy General Secretary Abrar Saeed Swati.
During the meeting, Senator Talha Mehmood expressed his gratitude to Governor Faisal Karim Kundi for his support and significant role during the Senate elections in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
Speaking on the occasion, Governor Kundi said that Senator Talha Mehmood and other PPP Senators would play a key role in upholding democratic values, improving Pakistan’s international image, and most importantly, addressing the longstanding issues of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
